channel.title: System update command and dds spec
channel.description: Can anyone help me by adding a System update command to my server, you know, the countdown thingy. And also, to prevend spamming, ill ask a proper working dds spec in the same topic. If you know a thread or how it has to be done, please post it, you will help me alot! :)
